amendment.description: Amendment to the Hyde amendment (A002) clarifies the responsibilities of the United States Agency for International Development and the State Department to the Millennium Challenge Corporation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 108-206 to make technical and clarifying changes.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Kolbe to the Hyde amendment (A002).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kolbe amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
